description: Numerical Stroop Task - Count items while suppressing digit reading

parameters.name: responsetype
parameters.description: Response method: 'keyboard', 'keypad', 'audio', or 'choose' (ask participant at start).

parameters.name: scorerealtime
parameters.description: For audio responses: set to 1 to score responses with keyboard in real-time. Otherwise responses must be coded afterward.

parameters.name: usepreset
parameters.description: If 1, use same sequence of stimuli every time. If 0, regenerate randomly on each run.

parameters.name: fixationTime
parameters.description: Time for the fixation cross in milliseconds.

parameters.name: responseTimeout
parameters.description: Time limit given for responding in milliseconds.

parameters.name: voicekeythreshold
parameters.description: Voice key threshold for audio responses (may need adjustment based on microphone).

parameters.name: saveAudio
parameters.description: Should the audio buffer be saved for audio responses?
